sections.heading: Service on individual in multiple capacitiesIn cases wherein an individual is named in pleadings in more than one capacity, personal service on that individual is sufficient to constitute service of process on that individual in all capacities, including but not limited to as an individual, tutor, o
sections.text: Service on individual in multiple capacitiesIn cases wherein an individual is named in pleadings in more than one capacity, personal service on that individual is sufficient to constitute service of process on that individual in all capacities, including but not limited to as an individual, tutor, or a representative of a legal or quasi legal entity, when it is clear from the pleadings or service instructions the capacities in which the individual is being served.Acts 1995, No. 851, ยง1; Acts 1995, No. 1257, ยง1.
